title: Why Kalista is weak
body: I think Kaliosta is too weak because evbery game the enemy team just gets a frozen heart on their tank line and she can't do shit. DO sometihng with that, that might make her better.

replies.body:
they shifted her power to only be effective when with her bonded pair. So if the supp dies very fast or roams, she becomes very weak.

That combined with a shift away from tanks and long scaling games to more early focused she got "meta'd" out.

With Assassins and Tanks predicted to be the new meta shift, she may see play again since she is a fairly good tank killer.

One of the main reasons she is weak imo is because of the meta shift in carry supports as she had hard enough time trading with the opposing adc let alone the support as well and she isn't a lane bully like most of the meta adc picks right now

I dont find her weak at all.

I mean she's weaker than people like Lucian or Vayne, but tbh... everyone always will be weaker than those bullies.

I got my lvl 7 on her on not long ago, and had no trouble getting good scores in most games.

She's hard, and a lot of people mistake that for weakness.
Also she's buggy and clunky as fuck lmao

Not very helpful feedback there but hey, I'll throw my 2c in too. She's weak because her item path isn't as flexible as many of the other adcs meaning that she has to prioritise attack speed, which isn't necessarily a good thing with the cost vs power, and the fact that shes been nerfed heavily to keep her mobility from going insane doesn't help her survive most things, especially given the huge amount of champions with dashes. A Frozen heart is all well and good to counter her with, but it shouldn't really negate her as hard as it does compared to everyone else. Even vayne still shreds people while against a frozen heart because she isn't getting doubly negated with armor and its aura.
